title: Independence Day
description: The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy Earth. Fighting superior technology, mankind's best weapon is the will to survive.

title: Fargo
production_studio: PolyGram Filmed Entertainment, Working Title Films
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen
description: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

title: Jerry Maguire
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: When a sports agent has a moral epiphany and is fired for expressing it, he decides to put his new philosophy to the test as an independent agent with the only athlete who stays with him and his former secretary.

title: Scream
description: A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a new killer, who targets the girl and her friends by using horror films as part of a deadly game.

title: The English Patient
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: At the close of WWII, a young nurse tends to a badly-burned plane crash victim. His past is shown in flashbacks, revealing an involvement in a fateful love affair.

title: Trainspotting
description: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out, despite the allure of the drugs and influence of friends.

title: Mission: Impossible
description: An American agent, under false suspicion of disloyalty, must discover and expose the real spy without the help of his organization.

title: Twister
production_studio: Warner Bros., Universal Pictures, Amblin Entertainment
description: Bill and Jo Harding, advanced storm chasers on the brink of divorce, must join together to create an advanced weather alert system by putting themselves in the cross-hairs of extremely violent tornadoes.

title: The Rock
production_studio: Hollywood Pictures, Don Simpson/Jerry Bruckheimer Films
description: A mild-mannered chemist and an ex-con, the only man to have ever escaped from Alcatraz, must lead the counterstrike when a rogue group of military men, led by a renegade general, threaten a nerve gas attack from Alcatraz against San Francisco.

title: Shine
production_studio: Australian Film Finance Corporation, Pandora Cinema
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: The true story of Australian pianist David Helfgott, from his troubled childhood to his struggles with mental illness and his eventual comeback.

title: Romeo + Juliet
description: Shakespeare's famous play is updated to the hip modern suburb of Verona still retaining its original dialogue.

title: Sling Blade
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material Previously Produced or Published
description: A partially handicapped man who was institutionalized for killing his mother and her lover is released and befriends a young boy.

title: Primal Fear
description: An arrogant, high-powered attorney takes on the case of a poor altar boy accused of murdering a Catholic archbishop.

title: Mars Attacks!
description: Earth is invaded by Martians with unbeatable weapons and a cruel sense of humor.

title: The Crucible
description: A Puritan girl in 17th-century Salem, Massachusetts, accuses her ex-lover's wife of witchcraft, leading to the Salem witch trials.

title: Secrets & Lies
description: A successful black woman who was adopted as a child seeks out her birth mother, only to discover that her mother is a working-class white woman.

title: Space Jam
production_studio: Warner Bros. Feature Animation, Northern Lights Entertainment
description: In a desperate attempt to win a basketball match and earn their freedom, the Looney Tunes seek the aid of retired basketball champion, Michael Jordan.

title: From Dusk Till Dawn
description: Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in a truck stop populated by vampires, with chaotic results.

title: The Nutty Professor
description: Grossly overweight yet good-hearted professor Sherman Klump takes a special chemical that turns him into the slim but obnoxious Buddy Love.

title: The Birdcage
description: A gay cabaret owner and his drag queen companion agree to put up a false straight front so that their son can introduce them to his fiancée's right-wing moralistic parents.

title: A Time to Kill
description: In Canton, Mississippi, a fearless young lawyer and his assistant defend a black man accused of murdering two white men who raped his ten-year-old daughter, sparking a rebirth of the KKK.

title: Lone Star
description: When the skeleton of his despised predecessor is found, a Texas sheriff must unearth his small town's long-buried secrets.

title: Breaking the Waves
description: In a remote Scottish village, a young woman's love for her paralyzed husband is tested when he asks her to have sex with other men.

title: Bottle Rocket
description: Three friends plan to pull off a simple robbery and go on the run.

title: Swingers
description: A group of single, unemployed actors live a life of partying and hanging out in Hollywood's 'cool' nightlife.

title: Beavis and Butt-Head Do America
production_studio: Paramount Pictures, MTV Films, Geffen Pictures
description: Our intrepid adolescent adventurers travel across America in search of their stolen television set.

title: Evita
description: The story of the life of Argentine political leader Eva Perón, the second wife of Argentine president Juan Perón.

title: The People vs. Larry Flynt
description: The story of Larry Flynt, the publisher of Hustler magazine, and his legal battles.

title: Hamlet
description: Prince Hamlet is depressed. Having been summoned home to Denmark from school in Germany to attend his father's funeral, he is shocked to find his mother Gertrude already remarried. The Queen has wed Hamlet's uncle Claudius, the dead king's brother.

title: Star Trek: First Contact
description: The Borg travel back in time to prevent Earth's first contact with an alien species, and the crew of the Enterprise-E must stop them.

title: 101 Dalmatians
description: An evil high-fashion designer plots to steal Dalmatian puppies in order to make an extravagant fur coat, but instead creates an extravagant mess.

title: Ransom
description: When a multimillionaire's son is kidnapped, he and his wife are forced to play a dangerous game with the kidnappers.

title: Set It Off
description: Four inner-city women, all of whom have suffered for lack of money and opportunity, decide to rob a bank.

title: That Thing You Do!
description: A local Pennsylvania band scores a one-hit wonder in 1964 and rides the star-making machinery as long as they can, with lots of help from their manager.

title: Matilda
description: A story of a wonderful little girl, who happens to be a genius, and her wonderful teacher vs. the worst parents ever and the worst school principal imaginable.

title: Crash
production_studio: Alliance Communications Corporation, The Movie Network
description: After getting into a serious car accident, a TV director discovers an underground sub-culture of scarred, omnisexual car-crash victims who use car crashes and the outward visible wounds of the collision to express their sexual desires.

title: The Cable Guy
description: A lonely and disturbed cable guy raised on television just wants a new friend, but his idea of friendship is a little warped.

title: Escape from L.A.
description: Snake Plissken is once again called in by the United States government to recover a potential doomsday device from Los Angeles, now an autonomous island where undesirables are deported.

title: Kingpin
production_studio: Rysher Entertainment, Motion Picture Corporation of America
description: A former professional bowler who lost his hand in a con game finds a new protégé and takes him on the road.

title: The First Wives Club
description: Reunited by the death of a college friend, three divorced women seek revenge on the husbands who left them for younger women.

title: The Frighteners
description: After a tragic car accident that killed his wife, a man discovers he can communicate with the dead to con people. However, when a demonic spirit appears, he may be the only one who can stop it from killing the living and the dead.
